com.facebook.react.bridge

接口 ReadableMap

  • 所有已知子接口:
    WritableMap
    所有已知实现类:
    JavaOnlyMap, ReadableNativeMap, WritableNativeMap

    public interface ReadableMap
    Interface for a map that allows typed access to its members. Used to pass parameters from JS to Java.
